Text: Thanks so much for these rips!! So great!!

V: 10/10
A: 10/10
Show: 10/10

Would you believe gimpy is the reason I signed up for an account a while back? Just so I could thank him for his continuous good work! :D
MY KIDS COULD HAVE BEEN KILLED!

Much thanks, gimpy! I dont have a trutv cable subscription and never have, but because of you and people like you who've made these shows available, I've become addicted to almost everything TruTV airs. Its really nice knowing I can go look at yesterday's schedule, see what new episode aired, and come back to here to grab it. :)
thanks man u always come through i miss this show everytime
I appreciate all of the nice comments from everyone. :)

If I think hard enough, I can recall back to the dark ages before everyone had access to the internet on thier phone, TV, computer, Nintendo and microwaves.....

if you didnt have cable you were fucked, son!

thanks for the upload.

Yeah... i started an account just to post thank-you comments as well. not having cable TV would suck so much more without uploaders, I felt compelled to let them know at least one person appreciates the effort.
